attributes.additional_details:
the British People are Disgusted by the doings of this GOv and such as Mayor of London thinking he is God
there is too much wrong doing by all Members of the House of Commons
we want a new Gov, that represents the Britsh People not Firstly themselfs
attributes.background: . Clause 61 of Magna Carta makes it clear that if the People are wronged by the Crown and no remedy is forthcoming after all steps have been exhausted, that the People may take whatever action is necessary to obtain satisfaction without fear of reprisal.
